questions.question: The poor people ................................... to the will of the tyrant.
questions.description: Bent is the past tense of bend.

questions.question: They ........................................ him hard until he fell unconscious.
questions.description: Hit is the past tense of hit.

questions.question: Civil war has .................................... the nation.
questions.description: Torn is the past participle of tear.

questions.question: The puppy ...................................... a hole in the stockings.
questions.description: Tore is the past tense of tear.

questions.question: The man ........................................ his money in his shoe.
questions.description: Hid is the past tense of hide.

questions.question: They are searching for ...................................... treasures.
questions.description: The past participle form of hide is hidden. Here it is used as an adjective.

questions.question: Suddenly the bomb ....................................
questions.description: Burst is the past and past participle of burst.

questions.question: I ...................................... my hand while cooking.
questions.description: Burn can be regular or irregular and the forms burned and burnt are both correct.

questions.question: A mosquito just ....................................... me.
questions.description: Bit is the past tense of bite.

questions.question: The hikers .......................................... their way up the hill.
questions.description: Wound is the past tense of wind.

questions.question: She ....................................... a diamond necklace to the party.
questions.description: Wore is the past tense of wear.

questions.question: His failure ........................................ his parents.
questions.description: Upset is the past tense of upset.
